bug.short_desc: widgets used as 'child widgets' should be able to keep their original theme

long_desc.thetext:
As discussed in http://article.gmane.org/gmane.comp.lang.javascript.qooxdoo.devel/42849
Widgets used a ChildControls tend to loose their theming (at least partially) even when there is not theme specified for the containing widget.
I think two things should happen:
a) childControls should keep using their original theme if there is no theme define for the new widget
b) when defining a child control I should be able to specify if it keeps its original theme or gets integrated into the new widget ...
the problem appears as soon as one tries to construct larger controls from existing widgets using the ChildControl approach.
